title: Bug 102623: Image not refreshing after reimporting
OB: When importing a new image into the layout, the previously imported image remains displayed.
EB: After importing a new image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout, the newly imported image should be displayed instead of the original image.
SR:
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
4. Observe the layout view to check if the newly renamed image is displayed.
